 * All definitions for theme light and default
 */
/* :root means default theme */
:root .by-uniframe-v2,
:root.theme-dark .by-uniframe-v2,
/* FIXME: remove below code later after user use the new rules */
:root header.header.by-uniframe-v2,
:root header.header .by-uniframe-v2,
:root .by-uniframe-v2.container-theme.theme-dark,
:root .by-uniframe-v2 .container-theme.theme-dark,
:root .by-uniframe-v2.component-theme.theme-dark,
:root .by-uniframe-v2 .component-theme.theme-dark,
:root .by-uniframe-v2.container-theme .component-theme.theme-dark
:root .by-uniframe-v2 .container-theme .component-theme.theme-dark {
  /* Base color definitions */
  --color-transparent: transparent;
  --color-white: #fff;
  --color-black: #000;
  --color-zebra: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.03);

  /* Color definitions */
  /* --brand-color-01: #ffb11a; */
  --brand-color-01: var(--bds-brand-700-normal, #ffb11a) !important;
  --brand-color-02: rgba(255, 177, 26, 0.5);
  --brand-color-03: rgba(255, 177, 26, 0.12);
  --brand-color-04: #ffce6e;

  /* Primary color definitions */
  --primary-color-01: #101014;
  --primary-color-02: #17181e;
  /* --primary-color-03: rgba(16, 16, 20, .95); */
  --primary-color-03: #3d3e46;
  --primary-color-04: #24252b;
  --primary-color-05: var(--primary-color-02);

  /* --primary-color-05: #212130; */

  --modal-bg-main: var(--primary-color-04);
  --modal-mask: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.2); /* mask / popover */

  /*  use in modal or table header or module header */
  --divide-line: 1px solid var(--gray-01);

  --long: #24ae64;
  --long-opacity: rgba(36, 174, 100, 0.08);
  --long-opacity-2: rgba(36, 174, 100, 0.2);
  --long-opacity-5: rgba(36, 174, 100, 0.5);
  --long-opacity-75: rgba(36, 174, 100, 0.75);
  --long-gradient: rgba(36, 174, 100, 0);
  --long-gradient-light: rgba(36, 174, 100, 0.15);
  --short: #e04040;
  --short-opacity: rgba(224, 64, 64, 0.08);
  --short-opacity-2: rgba(224, 64, 64, 0.2);
  --short-opacity-5: rgba(224, 64, 64, 0.5);
  --short-opacity-75: rgba(224, 64, 64, 0.75);
  --short-gradient: rgba(224, 64, 64, 0);
  --short-gradient-light: rgba(224, 64, 64, 0.15);

  /* Gray color definitions */
  /* special gray color */
  --gray-003: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.03);
  --gray-004: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.04);
  --gray-005: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.05);
  --gray-006: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.06);
  --gray-008: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.08);
  /* normal gray color */
  --gray-01: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.05);
  --gray-015: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.15);
  --gray-02: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.1);
  --gray-02-solid: #2e2f34;
  --gray-03: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.2);
  --gray-04: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.3);
  --gray-04-solid: #2b2b30;
  --gray-05: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.45);
  --gray-06: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.5);
  --gray-07: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.65); /*  */
  --gray-08: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.85);
  --gray-09: rgba(255, 255, 255, 1);

  /* Functional color */
  --f-success-01: #3dbd7d;
  --f-warning-01: #ffb11a;
  --f-danger-01: #ff3b30;
  --f-info-01: blue;

  /* Font definition */
  --font-color-main: var(--gray-07);
  --font-color-light: var(--gray-07); /*   */

  /* box shadow */
  --popover-shadow: 4px 4px 20px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.2);
  --switch-dot-shadow: 2px 0 6px 0 rgb(0, 0, 0, 0.25);

  /* tradingview-color rgba */
  --tv-main-color: #8b8b8e;
  --tv-color-platform-background: #17181e;
  --tv-color-cross-hair: #989898;
  --tv-color-blue: #5884d0;
  --tv-color-blue-0: #181a22;
  --tv-color-vert-grid: #222226;
  --tv-color-horz-grid: #222226;
}

/*# sourceMappingURL=data:application/json;base64, */</style><style>:root {
  /* size definitions, use 4x times unit */
  --size-0: 0;
  --size-1: 1px;

  /* special size for some special case */

  --special-size-2: 2px;
  /* e.g. in some calculations, like 12px/2 = 6px */

  --font-size-6: 6px;

  --font-size-18: 18px;
  --font-size-20: 20px;
  --font-size-24: 24px;
  --font-size-48: 48px;
}

/*# sourceMappingURL=data:application/json;base64, */</style><style>#uniFrameHeader.header {
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: space-between;
  height: var(--size-48);
  background-color: var(--primary-color-02);
  color: #fff;
}
#uniFrameHeader.header .by-dropdown__new_icon {
  color: #71757a;
}
#uniFrameHeader.header.hidden {
  visibility: hidden;
}
@media screen and (max-width: 500px) {
  #uniFrameHeader.header {
    overflow-x: scroll;
  }
  #uniFrameHeader.header::-webkit-scrollbar {
    width: 0;
    height: 0;
  }
  #uniFrameHeader.header::-webkit-scrollbar-button {
    background-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0);
  }
  #uniFrameHeader.header::-webkit-scrollbar-track {
    background-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0);
  }
  #uniFrameHeader.header::-webkit-scrollbar-track-piece {
    background-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0);
  }
  #uniFrameHeader.header::-webkit-scrollbar-thumb {
    background-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0);
  }
  #uniFrameHeader.header::-webkit-scrollbar-corner {
    background-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0);
  }
}
#uniFrameHeader .header a:hover {
  color: var(--brand-color-01) !important;
}
#uniFrameHeader .header-left,
#uniFrameHeader .header-right {
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  flex-shrink: 0;
}
#uniFrameHeader .download-wrap {
  position: relative;
  justify-content: center;
  width: var(--size-48);
  height: var(--size-48);
  line-height: var(--size-48);
  text-align: center;
  cursor: pointer;
}
#uniFrameHeader .download-wrap span {
  vertical-align: middle;
}
#uniFrameHeader .download-wrap:hover svg path {
  fill: var(--brand-color-01);
}
#uniFrameHeader .download-wrap-open {
  background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.06);
}

#uniFrameHeader .download-app {
  position: absolute;
  top: 48px;
  z-index: 99;
  width: 198px;
  min-height: 272px;
  padding: 20px;
  background: #25282c;
  border-radius: 0 0 8px 8px;
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
}

[dir="ltr"] #uniFrameHeader .download-app {
  right: -1px;
}

[dir="rtl"] #uniFrameHeader .download-app {
  left: -1px;
}
#uniFrameHeader .appCode {
  width: 158px;
  height: 158px;
}
#uniFrameHeader .download-app-desc {
  position: relative;
  margin-top: 12px;
  color: var(--color-white);
  line-height: 14px;
  margin-bottom: 12px;
}
#uniFrameHeader .download-app-btn {
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: center;
  width: 158px;
  height: 32px;
  padding: 8px 12px;
  font-size: var(--size-12);
  font-style: normal;
  font-weight: 600;
  line-height: 18px;
  background-color: var(--bds-brand-700-normal, #f7a600);
  border-radius: var(--bds-border-radius-button, 4px);
  cursor: pointer;
  will-change: color, background-color;
  transition: transform 0.15s linear;
  color: var(--bds-static-black, #121214);
}
#uniFrameHeader .download-app-btn:hover {
  background-color: var(--bds-brand-600-hover, #ffc35c);
}

[dir="ltr"] #uniFrameHeader .download {
  padding: 0 16px 0 10px;
}

[dir="rtl"] #uniFrameHeader .download {
  padding: 0 10px 0 16px;
}

#uniFrameHeader .logo {
  width: auto;
  height: 22px;
}

[dir="ltr"] #uniFrameHeader .logo {
  margin-left: var(--size-16);
}

[dir="rtl"] #uniFrameHeader .logo {
  margin-right: var(--size-16);
}
#uniFrameHeader .header-login,
#uniFrameHeader .header-register {
  box-sizing: content-box;
  padding: 0 20px;
  font-weight: 600;
  font-size: var(--size-14);
  line-height: 32px;
  text-align: center;
  cursor: pointer;
  border-radius: var(--bds-border-radius-button, 4px);
}
@keyframes breatheAni {
  0% {
    transform: scale(1);
  }
  50% {
    transform: scale(1.06);
  }
  to {
    transform: scale(1);
  }
}
#uniFrameHeader .header-register {
  animation: breatheAni 1.5s ease-in-out infinite 1s;
  transition: transform 0.3s ease;
}
#uniFrameHeader .header-register:hover {
  transform: scale(1.05);
}
#uniFrameHeader .header-login {
  color: #fff;
}
#uniFrameHeader .header-login:hover {
  color: var(--bds-brand-700-normal, #f7a600);
  background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.06);
}
#uniFrameHeader .header-register {
  color: var(--primary-color-02);
  background-color: var(--bds-brand-700-normal, #f7a600);
}
#uniFrameHeader .header-status {
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  white-space: nowrap;
}
#uniFrameHeader .header-left-switch-portal {
  height: 48px;
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: center;

/*# sourceMappingURL=data:application/json;base64, */</style><link rel="stylesheet" type="text/css" href="https://www.bybit.com/fe-lib-footer/FooterLarge.8ff79789.css"><style>.by-uniframe-v2 .by-input {
  box-sizing: border-box;
  display: inline-flex;
  flex-direction: column;
  font-size: var(--font-size-12);
  position: relative;
  width: 100%;
  height: initial;
}
.by-uniframe-v2 .by-input__container {
  align-items: center;
  border: 1px solid var(--color-transparent);
  border-radius: var(--size-4);
  background-clip: padding-box;
  color: var(--gray-08);
  display: inline-flex;
  height: var(--size-24);
  position: relative;
  transition: border-color 0.15s linear, background-color 0.15s linear;
  width: 100%;
  will-change: border-color, background-color;
}
.by-uniframe-v2 .by-input__wrapper {
  align-items: center;
  margin: var(--size-0) var(--size-10);
  position: relative;
  width: 100%;
}
.by-uniframe-v2 .by-input__mask {
  align-items: center;
  cursor: pointer;
  display: flex;
  height: 100%;
  position: absolute;
  width: 100%;
}
.by-uniframe-v2 .by-input__inner {
  transition: color 0.15s linear;
  will-change: color;
}
.by-uniframe-v2 .by-input__tips {
  margin-top: var(--size-4);
}
.by-uniframe-v2 .by-input.txt-align--center .by-input__inner {
  text-align: center;
}

[dir="ltr"] .by-uniframe-v2 .by-input.txt-align--right .by-input__inner {
  text-align: right;
}

[dir="rtl"] .by-uniframe-v2 .by-input.txt-align--right .by-input__inner {
  text-align: left;
}
.by-uniframe-v2 .by-input--contained .by-input__container {
  background-color: var(--gray-01);
  border: none;
}
.by-uniframe-v2 .by-input.by-input--outlined .by-input__container:focus-within {
  border-color: var(--brand-color-02);
}
.by-uniframe-v2 .by-input.by-input--outlined .by-input__container:focus-within .by-input__inner {
  color: var(--gray-07);
}
.by-uniframe-v2 .by-input--outlined .by-input__container {
  border: solid 1px var(--gray-03);
}
.by-uniframe-v2 .by-input--outlined.by-input--gc-1 .by-input__container {

","bannerDescS2":"Auction Phase 2 ends in","preMarketA1":"Pre-Market Perpetuals Trading is an over-the-counter (OTC) trading service that allows you to trade Perpetual Contracts on new tokens before official listing. This offers the chance to engage in early price discovery and speculate on the future value of the upcoming tokens. \n\nWith Pre-Market Perpetuals, you can:\n\nGain Early Access to Promising New Contracts\nPre-Market Perpetuals enable you to place orders before the contract is officially listed, helping you avoid potential entry cost increases due to price volatility at launch. Upon a successful opening, your order will be executed at the opening price if it matches your specified price.\n\nHedge Spot Positions to Secure Profits\nIf you have adopted a short-selling strategy or engaged in Pre-Market Spot Trading, you can hedge with Pre-Market Perpetuals to minimize risks.","preMarketA2":"Bybit's Call Auction takes place in three (3) phases to minimize post-opening price volatility and reduce liquidation risks.\n\nAuction Phase 1: To discover the fair price. You are free to place or cancel orders at your desired price, which helps establish the market consensus price. The Est. Opening Price is calculated every minute for the first 10 minutes, and every five (5) seconds for the next 10 minutes. No fees are charged during this session. \nAuction Phase 2: To stabilize prices and prevent manipulation. Orders can be placed, but not canceled. The Est. Opening Price is calculated every five (5) seconds throughout this five-minute phase. \n\nPrice Matching: To determine the opening price and execute orders. Upon a successful opening, all matchable buy and sell orders will be fulfilled, and positions will be opened at the opening price. Any unfulfilled orders will remain in the order book and can be canceled during the Continuous Auction phase. You can check if your orders have been fulfilled once Price Matching is completed.","preMarketA3":"Participants must have a Bybit account and complete Identity Verification to engage in Pre-Market Perpetuals Trading. Existing deposit and withdrawal limits will apply.","preMarketA3Title":"How to Trade Pre-Market Perpetuals","preMarketA3T2":"Quotation","preMarketA4":"Pre-Market Perpetual Contracts will not be delivered during the transition to standard Perpetual Contracts. The exchange between USDx and USD happens automatically during CFD trading.","mt5Agreement":"Bybit MT5 User Agreement v06 (Aug 1, 2025)\nUSER AGREEMENT  BYBIT METATRADER 5 (MT5)\n\n1. Introduction\n1.1. The service of trading on the MT5 platform on the Site (as defined below) and the associated application program or mobile applications (together referred to as the \"MT5 Platform\") and related services (together, the \"MT5 Services\") are provided by Infra Capital Limited, a company incorporated in Mauritius with its registered address at Suite 201, 2nd Floor, The Catalyst, 40 Silicon Avenue, Ebene Cybercity, Mauritius, and bearing registration number 200907 (hereinafter, the \"Company\", \"we\", \"us\" or \"our\").\n\n1.2. Certain parts of the MT5 Services that involve trading or dealing with Digital Assets are provided by Bybit Technology Limited.\n\n1.3. For the avoidance of doubt, the Parties acknowledge and agree that:\nInfra shall be the contracting party and regulated entity with respect to the CFD (as defined below) services offered via the TradFi platform.Bybit Technology Limited (\"Bybit\") acts solely as an infrastructure service provider to Infra for the purposes of onboarding facilitation, user interface execution, ledger support, sub-custody of client funds and fiat conversion services under this Agreement. Any separate relationship between a client and Bybit, including but not limited to the provision of custodial, wallet or trading services by Bybit under separate terms and conditions, shall be deemed independent of, and unrelated to, the services provided under this Agreement.Infra and Bybit operate as independent service providers. Nothing in this Agreement shall be construed to create a joint service offering, partnership, agency or shared client relationship. Infra remains solely responsible for its clients, including onboarding, AML/CFT compliance and custody of assets. Bybit does not hold or control client funds or virtual assets on behalf of Infra or its clients, nor does it perform any regulated activities unless expressly agreed to in writing, in compliance with applicable law. Any overlap of users shall not constitute or imply a joint client relationship.\n1.4. All access to and use of the MT5 Services are subject to the terms and conditions set forth below (the \"Terms\" or \"Agreement\"). This Agreement is entered into between you and the Company. If you (the \"User\", \"you\" or \"your\") do not agree to any terms or conditions of this Agreement, you must immediately cease using the MT5 Services.\n\n1.5. Your access to and use of the MT5 Services constitute your acceptance of, and agreement to be bound by, the terms and conditions of this Agreement, as well as the Terms of Service and Privacy Policy, which may be amended from time to time by us (in relation to this Agreement) or by Bybit Technology Limited (in relation to the Terms of Service and Privacy Policy), as the case may be.\n\n1.6. Unless otherwise defined or the context requires otherwise, all capitalized terms shall have the meaning given to them in this Agreement:\n\"Bybit Account\" has the meaning assigned to it in Clause 2.3.\"CFD\" means a Contract for Difference (which may be leveraged) between a buyer and a seller, under which the buyer agrees to pay the seller the difference between the opening and closing trade prices of a Referenced Asset, without buying or owning the Referenced Asset.\"Referenced Asset\" means the asset(s) referred to, including Digital Assets, foreign currencies and commodities.\"Settlements\" means the consideration paid by either party to the other at the conclusion of a CFD. All CFD products are settled exclusively in USD, regardless of the deposit or withdrawal currency. \"Digital Assets\" means Bitcoin, Ether, USDT, or other crypto, digital assets or currencies.\"Governmental Authority\" means any nation, government, province, state or any other political subdivision thereof, or any entity, authority or body exercising executive, legislative, judicial, regulatory or administrative functions of or pertaining to government. This includes any agency, department, board, commission, instrumentality or any political subdivision thereof; any court, tribunal or arbitrator; or any self-regulatory organization.\"Infra\" refers to Infra Capital Limited and Infra Capital Limited LLC.\"Personal Information\" means information provided by a User from which the User's identity may be directly or indirectly ascertained.\"Platform\" means the Site, including any associated application program or mobile applications.\"Service Notifications\" means one-way notifications from the Company (which may include security-related alerts) delivered via SMS, email or, where applicable, push notifications through the Site, concerning certain events or information related to the MT5 Services.\"Site\" means bybit.com, as operated by Bybit Technology Limited.\"Third-Party Account\" means a separate financial services account that a User establishes with a Third-Party Services Provider to conduct transactions.\"Third-Party Services Provider\" means any third party that offers a trading, fiat-to-crypto exchange or other financial services account that can be registered and accessed through the Platform.\"Third-Party Services Provider Terms\" means the terms, conditions and policies established by a Third-Party Services Provider for a Third-Party Account.\"USD\" or \"US$\" means United States Dollars, the legal currency of the United States of America.\n2. Account\n2.1. In order to use the services on the MT5 Platform, you must create a separate MT5 account (the \"MT5 Account\"). The MT5 Account will be used to record USDT transferred by you into your Bybit Account and to conduct transactions on the MT5 Platform. An MT5 Account may be registered by any individual who is at least eighteen (18) years old or by an institution through its duly authorized representatives, provided that such individual or institution has read and understood the Risk Disclosure Statements, which are incorporated by reference into, and form part of, this Agreement. Each User may register only one MT5 Account on the MT5 Platform. Registering multiple MT5 Accounts constitutes a violation of this Agreement and may result in the immediate termination of the MT5 Account(s) involved.\n\n2.2. The MT5 Account is not a bank account and does not hold any Digital Assets. Any balance displayed in the MT5 Account is solely a representation and record of the equivalent Digital Assets you have deposited into your Bybit Account and does not reflect any actual holding of those assets within the MT5 Account. For operational and financial reporting purposes, the Platform may reflect certain Digital Asset balances using internal, fiat-referenced units such as USDx. USDx is a non-transferable, non-tokenized unit of account used solely within the Platform to represent the USD-equivalent value of specific stablecoin holdings (e.g., USDT). Except as otherwise permitted by the Company, no interest will be paid on any funds reflected in your MT5 Account or Bybit Account. Any Digital Assets held directly by us for your benefit remain in your Bybit Account and are not insured by any Governmental Authority.\n\n2.3. Users acknowledge that:\nUSDx does not represent a separate asset or currency; it is an internal account metric.USDx always represents USDT at a 1:1 rate within the platform.USDx is not a token and cannot be transferred on-chain or withdrawn directly.USDx functions solely as an internal accounting reference to support platform usability, reconciliation and regulatory compliance.By using TradFi, you consent to the use of USDx in your account for display and accounting purposes.\n\n2.4. For the avoidance of doubt, the Parties acknowledge and agree that:\nInfra shall be the contracting party and regulated entity with respect to the CFD services offered via the Platform.Bybit acts solely as an infrastructure service provider to Infra for the purposes of onboarding facilitation, user interface execution, ledger support, sub-custody of client funds and fiat conversion services under this Agreement.Bybit does not provide investment advice, execution services or custody to clients in or from Mauritius, or on behalf of Infra.Bybit does not provide services in or from Mauritius; it is incorporated and operates in or from Seychelles.Any separate relationship between a client and Bybit, including but not limited to the provision of custodial, wallet or trading services by Bybit under separate terms and conditions, shall be deemed independent of, and unrelated to, the services provided under this Agreement.Infra and Bybit shall not be deemed to jointly offer services to any client, and no joint or shared client relationship shall arise from any overlap of users unless expressly and separately documented.\n2.5. You may fund the MT5 Account by transferring USDT to your account on the Platform opened with Bybit (\"Bybit Account\"). This transfer does not involve the actual custody of Digital Assets within the MT5 Account; it merely updates the representation of your available balance for trading purposes. The Platform does not charge any fees for funding the MT5 Account. In the event of the Company's insolvency, your Digital Assets (including StableX) may be subject to insolvency proceedings and are not protected by any external guarantees. \n\n\n3. Trading Using the MT5 Services\n3.1. The MT5 Platform is a marketplace that allows you to trade Contracts for Difference (\"CFDs\") with other Users. The MT5 Platform functions solely to match purchase and sale orders placed by Users and to assist in executing such orders in accordance with the Users' expressed intent. Except as expressly specified otherwise in this Agreement, neither the Company nor the Platform acts as a principal or counterparty to any such transactions. The Company and the Platform shall not be responsible for any disputes between or among Users in connection with any transaction.\n\n3.2. This also means that when you withdraw Digital Assets in the form of the Referenced Asset, you are instructing the Bybit Account to convert your Settlements into that Referenced Asset. For the avoidance of doubt, all CFD Settlements are calculated and executed in USD, regardless of the deposit or withdrawal currency. While deposits and withdrawals are made in USDT, the exchange between USDT and USD will occur automatically for the purpose of calculating and executing Settlements in fiat currency.\n\n3.2.1 You acknowledge and agree that all CFD Settlements are denominated and executed in USD. Although deposits and withdrawals may be made in USDT, the Platform will automatically perform all necessary currency conversions to facilitate settlement. You accept any exchange rate applied at the time of conversion and acknowledge and assume any associated exchange risk, including risks arising from market fluctuations or slippage.\n\n3.3. Orders are automatically matched by the MT5 Platform through third-party liquidity providers, and the MT5 Platform will notify the respective Users once the order has been executed. Upon matching, the order is executed and cleared instantaneously. YOU SHOULD ONLY PLACE AN ORDER IF YOU FULLY INTEND TO COMPLETE THE TRANSACTION. You may cancel a pre-authorized order by initiating a closure request through your MT5 Account prior to execution.\n\n3.4. You acknowledge that it may not be possible, in all circumstances, to cancel or modify an order, even before it has been matched or executed. We assume no responsibility for ensuring that any order is modified or canceled. You understand and agree that, if an order cannot be canceled or modified, you remain bound by the execution of the original order. You further acknowledge that attempts to modify or cancel and replace an order may result in over-execution or duplicate executions, and you are solely responsible for all such outcomes.\n\n3.5. You shall be deemed to have submitted an order through the MT5 Platform once we acknowledge receipt of such order via the MT5 Platform or by other means as we may determine (regardless of whether you actually receive or become aware of the acknowledgment). You understand that the MT5 Platform provides real-time visibility of all your open orders and pending instructions. It is your sole responsibility to monitor your open orders and pending instructions in real time until the MT5 Platform acknowledges full execution, cancellation or rejection. We assume no responsibility or liability if you fail to do so. In the event that you fail to immediately notify us of any error in the real-time acknowledgment of the status of any open order or pending instruction, including the MT5 Platform's failure to promptly acknowledge the receipt of your order, we reserve the right, at our sole discretion (and acting in good faith), to require you to either accept the trade or have it removed from your MT5 Account, at your sole benefit or loss. We may, at our discretion, require additional electronic, verbal, written, or other forms of confirmation before processing instructions that appear outside your MT5 Account's normal activity pattern.\n\n3.6. Your orders are subject to trading limits, which we may establish, revise and communicate to you from time to time.\n\n3.7. Subject to Section 3.14, once an order is executed, the transaction may not be reversible.\n\n3.8. You acknowledge that, due to technical or other limitations, the price of the Referenced Asset displayed on the MT5 Platform may be delayed and may not reflect current market values. Nevertheless, you agree that the prices displayed on the MT5 Platform shall determine the value of your MT5 Account and govern your use of the MT5 Platform.\n\n3.9. You acknowledge and agree that we cannot and do not warrant or guarantee that any order placed through the MT5 Platform will be executed at the best posted price.\n\n3.10. You acknowledge and agree that you are solely responsible for maintaining sufficient margin for all positions in your MT5 Account at all times.\n\n3.11. You acknowledge and agree that you are also responsible for depositing additional margin when necessary and for ensuring that your MT5 Account has sufficient funds to meet margin requirements for any open positions at all times, regardless of whether the Company or the MT5 Platform provides notice of any margin shortfall.\n\n3.12. You acknowledge and agree that, if you fail to maintain the required margin for any open positions, we have the right (but not the obligation), at our sole discretion, to initiate a compulsory stop-out of any or all positions when your MT5 Account balance reaches or falls below the stop-out level. Notwithstanding the foregoing, the Company is under no obligation to close or liquidate any positions or take any action with respect to your positions if you fail to maintain sufficient margin.\n\n3.13. You further acknowledge and agree that:\nAny losses resulting from the compulsory stop-out or liquidation of any open positions are your responsibility and shall be borne by you; andWe shall not be liable for any losses resulting from the compulsory stop-out or liquidation should we exercise any or all of our rights under this Agreement.\n3.14. In the absence of mutual consent of parties involved, we reserve the right to cancel or nullify transactions in the event that:\nthe transaction resulted from an identifiable interruption or malfunction of the execution, settlement or communication system;we, at our sole discretion, believe the transaction to be fraudulent, manipulative or disruptive to other Users or the MT5 Platform;the transaction was executed by an MT5 Account that has been compromised or accessed by unauthorized users, and we determine in good faith that cancellation of the transaction is in the best interest of Users or the MT5 Platform;the transaction was executed by exploiting arbitrage, market failures or off-market rates;a technical issue prevented the transaction from executing as intended;a liquidity provider canceled or altered the transaction;the transaction was partially executed with the liquidity provider; orwe believe, at our sole discretion, that your MT5 Account, transactions or trading activities therein violate this Agreement.\n4.
